Title: This Secret is Staying With Me! Ep.1
SubTitle: No Translation

Text:
Epsilon stands before a giant mirror in the dark,
manipulating slime to shape her chest.

It's not all about size. Breasts should be ideally
shaped, soft, and supple. And above all, they
should beâ€”

Natural. That is the most important factor.
The balance of the waist, hips and overall
silhouette is also crucial.

If I cut corners here, then others will notice
something is off.

They're pretty perky. Not many people will notice
them I'm sure, but I won't be careless. My aim is for
perfection, even if it takes some time.

Hmm...maybe it's a bit too tight in my waist compared
to my chest. I'll loosen it a bit... How about this?

She's not aiming for slimness. She's focusing on
overall balance and natural beauty.

That subtle tweaking of magic that is poured into the
slime... That is what makes it look natural or artificial.

The perfect proportions, the result of years of
research and trial and error... Not a single
element that can lose against "natural."

Hehe, my nickname, "The Faithful," isn't just
for show.

By the time she finishes her meticulous and tedious
adjustments, the sun has risen.

All right, that does it for my morning routine!
I feel as beautiful as always!

When Epsilon sees herself in the mirror, she nods
in delight and leaves the room in high spirits.
An...archaeological site survey?
You don't sound very enthused.
Well...
(Surveys like this are always a mixed bag.)

(If there is a powerful artifact buried somewhere, or
if intense magic is detected nearby, usually one of
the Seven Shadows will lead the investigation,
but...why this place?)

Let me guess. You're wondering if the site is worthy
of one of the Seven Shadows being sent, right?

Not at all... If that's your command, Lady Alpha,
I'll abide by it.

(Neither Lady Alpha nor Master Shadow has ever been
wrong in their judgment. I'll loyally perform my duty
without hesitation...)

Do you feel that the site is so important that it's
necessary for the Seven Shadows to go there?

I'm still unsure. Honestly, I don't have enough
information to make a proper judgment yet.

The other day I sent a unit from the Shadow Garden to
investigate the ruins...

So I will be working with them to further carry out
the investigation...?
Actually, I lost contact with them.

Apparently, the unit that was dispatched was one of
the more inexperienced ones... Even so...

Lady Alpha is calm and collected as she speaks, but if
she had lost contact with the unit, it must mean there
was some sort of disruption at the ruins.

So we're unable to contact them anymore... I don't
even want to imagine it, but perhaps...

Yes, I can only assume the worst. That makes me wary
of sending a new unit since there's a risk that the same
thing could happen again.

Whether the reason for the loss of communication
stems from the archaeological site orâ€”

It's possible that the Cult of Diablos or even the
Named Children could be behind this.

It's unlikely that thieves or ordinary dark knights
would defeat Shadow Garden troops.

We considered various options and decided that it'd
be best to send someone from the Seven Shadows.
I think it's a sensible decision.

(When you're unsure of a situation, you assume the
worst and resort to a more drastic option. Even
I'd make the same decision as you, Lady Alpha...)

So I had to pick someone. If it was solely based
on combat skills, the most reliable option would
be Deltaâ€”
But it's not that simple.

Ah...I can picture her skipping the site altogether and
indulging in "hunting."

You think so too? With unknown ruins, it's more than
just combat abilityâ€”it's about being adaptable based
on the situation.
Ah, so that's why I'm...?

Exactly. Someone with the nickname of "The Faithful"
is the perfect choice.

Your judgement is impeccable, and if you got into a
fight, you'd make quick work of Named... Well, even
if you did fight Rounds, you'd be fine.
Well?
It's an honor to be regarded that favorably.

(I thought at first I was going to do a survey, but
now I get it... You know me too well, Lady Alpha.)
By the way...does Master Shadow know about this...?

After all, Epsilon wants her duty to be appreciated by
the man who she adores so much. She is desperate
for even a word of encouragement.
Absolutely. I've spoken to him.
A-And what did he...
Hmm, wellâ€”

He didn't say much, but he surely thought that you
were up to completing the task.

(Ah, even if you didn't say much, I know you trust in
me, Master Shadow... I'll accomplish my mission and
exceed your expectations!)

So, what do you say, Epsilon? You will accept this
mission, right?... You haven't given me a clear
answer yet.

A-Absolutely! I'd be glad to do it! I'll make sure to
complete this mission perfectly!
I-I see... Well, give it your all.
